about_the_game:
Own the original atmospheric score from The Norwood Suite, composed by Cosmo D. Includes mp3 and FLAC versions.

Tracklist

1. Norwood Suite Theme
2. Basset Hound Incident
3. Edge of the Estate
4. Heads
5. Lobby Reflections
6. Blue Moose Man
7. Young Bruce in 308
8. Pool Gaze
9. Norwood's Last Disciple
10. High End Ruminations
11. DJ Bogart Takes Control
12. Room 316
13. The Final Look
14. Murial's Ride
15. Tableaus (bonus track)
16. Kitchen (bonus track)
